body:
modify moab to allow more tools, and linking with cgm
add more variants for moab 
still to do in moab:
  enable pymoab
  enable tempest (new package)

package meshkit with minimal configuration; more work for netgen link 

it depends on moab and cgm; 
moab has to be built with irel, and cgm
cgm dependency can be derived from moab
title: Moab 5.0 , cgm 16.0, and meshkit 1.5
